solution_line_template: If Sandro has three sons, the total number of daughters, six times the number of sons, is {num_sons} sons * {daughters_multiplier} daughters/son = <<{num_sons}*{daughters_multiplier}={num_daughters}>>{num_daughters} daughters.
The total number of children is {num_daughters} daughters + {num_sons} sons = <<{num_daughters}+{num_sons}={total_children}>>{total_children} children.
